reviewText: Not to good incomplete movie i'd rather not recommended to no body!
Great Story, Halfway into the movie it skipped and just was recorded badly.
Product arrived exactly as described. Also arrived on time so I would recommend seller and item. Thanks.
This movie shows the joy of being a kid all over again and remember the good ole times. I recommend this movies for the kids who want to know the meaning of friendship.
My mom always loved this movie, so I bought her the DVD format. She grew up with this and I just wanted to give her something from her childhood.

I don't know who that is on the cover, but it looks nothing like the girl who plays Red Riding Hood. Anyway, this is probably the weakest of the three as the wolf is bad and as a result not as funny. While this is essential viewing to understand the story, the third film Red Riding Hood and the Monsters is the funniest. Once the wolf turns good, the movies really go off the rails (in a good way). These are great movies to make you feel like a kid again. The quality is so much better than former releases. Do yourself a favor and buy the 3-pack. And yes kids, you do have to read sub-titles if you don't speak Spanish. I know no one likes to read anymore but too bad.

i remember this movie when i was a child and am now able to share with my students another version of little red riding hood in spanish... this film also contains english subtitles which does not do it justice because the film in it's original language is the best.
